Normal Mandhi

Kuzhimanthi is a traditional dish from Kerala, India. It is a type of rice dumplings that are steamed in a special leaf called "Koovalam" or "Teak leaf." The rice dumplings are prepared by mixing rice flour with grated coconut, cumin seeds, and salt. This mixture is then shaped into small dumplings and steamed in the leaf, giving it a unique flavor.

Price: ₹ 650
